医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，与 COVID-19 相关的血浆炎症因子不会影响血脑屏障现在有充分证据表明，冠状病毒的爆发引发了全球健康危机。在这项研究中，研究人员想知道血脑屏障损伤是否会在 COVID-19 进展过程中导致神经系统问题的发生，以及影响程度如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/covid-19-关联-血液-血浆-炎症-因子-do-not-affect-blood-brain-barrier-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/covid-19-关联-血液-血浆-炎症-因子-do-not-affect-blood-brain-barrier-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d42bb9bd-d396-41f8-9e27-6a72676fa269 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:56:14 -0500 COVID-19-associated blood plasma inflammatory factors do not affect blood-brain barrier, study shows
免疫检查点抑制剂靶点被发现可促进皮肤癌生长程序性细胞死亡 1 (PD-1) 是免疫检查点抑制剂疗法的重要靶标，可阻断其信号传导并增强 T 细胞活性。 PD-1抑制剂已被批准用于治疗多种类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Immune-checkpoint-inhibitor-target-found-to-promote-skin-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Immune-checkpoint-inhibitor-target-found-to-promote-skin-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dea31e22-5070-4f1d-8e71-736bd7a4a523 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:37:38 -0500 Immune checkpoint inhibitor target found to promote skin cancer growth
使用人工智能打破阿片类药物成瘾循环当化学研究助理教授本·布朗思考阿片类药物的流行时，他从分子水平上看待这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Using-AI-to-break-the-opioid-addiction-cycle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Using-AI-to-break-the-opioid-addiction-cycle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699521d2-6377-4794-976c-a0efa2515604 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:22:37 -0500 Using AI to break the opioid addiction cycle
研究揭示了急诊室约束使用的种族和民族差异一项新的研究为越来越多的证据提供了更多数据，证明急诊室 (ED) 约束使用的差异，该研究已发表在学术急诊医学 (AEM) 一月号上，该杂志是学术协会的同行评审期刊急诊医学（SAEM）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86bd9ff6-a356-4a36-a7ed-b8f8661b7c57 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:52:27 -0500 Study reveals disparities in emergency department restraint use by race and ethnicity
蒙大拿州扩大疫苗宗教豁免的努力引发政治僵局蒙大拿州立法者与该州卫生部门就儿童保育许可规则的一揽子彻底改革陷入僵局，其中包括一项有争议的条款，允许宗教豁免儿童和工人的常规疫苗接种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=532bd855-44d1-417d-8e61-be825b5e6acd Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:00:02 -0500 Montana’s effort to expand religious exemptions to vaccines prompts political standoff
AI 利用新型 PHD 抑制剂治疗贫血取得突破临床阶段生成人工智能 (AI) 驱动的生物技术公司 InSilico Medicine (“InSilico”) 今天宣布，ACS Publications 旗下专注于分子结构和生物活性关键研究的期刊《Journal of Medicinal Chemistry》已发表该公司的发现一种用于治疗贫血的新型 PHD 抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-scores-breakthrough-in-anemia-treatment-with-novel-PHD-inhibitor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-scores-breakthrough-in-anemia-treatment-with-novel-PHD-inhibitor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda317ac-053f-44c4-ba61-122bcc77a644 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:47:00 -0500 AI scores breakthrough in anemia treatment with novel PHD inhibitor
Insilico Medicine 利用人工智能确定乳腺癌和妇科癌症有前景的新靶标Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司，最近发表了一项早期研究，确定 MYT1 是乳腺癌和妇科癌症的一个有前景的新治疗靶点，并发现了一系列专门针对 MYT1 的新型、有效、高选择性抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insilico-Medicine-leverages-AI-to-identify-promising-new-target-for-breast-and-gynecological-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insilico-Medicine-leverages-AI-to-identify-promising-new-target-for-breast-and-gynecological-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cfbc25d-3be5-4515-b5ea-b02b239a37a7 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:40:00 -0500 Insilico Medicine leverages AI to identify promising new target for breast and gynecological cancers
通过纳米载体输送的新型口服胰岛素可能很快就会取代注射胰岛素全球约有 4.25 亿人患有糖尿病。其中大约有 7500 万人每天注射胰岛素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-oral-insulin-delivered-via-nano-carriers-could-soon-replace-injections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-oral-insulin-delivered-via-nano-carriers-could-soon-replace-injections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0221353-f458-4d23-b856-870d50652037 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:32:41 -0500 New oral insulin delivered via nano-carriers could soon replace injections
揭示印迹巩固和记忆细化的细胞机制想一想您在短时间内有两次不同但相似的经历的经历。也许您在同一周内参加了两次假日聚会或在工作中进行了两次演讲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Unveiling-the-cellular-mechanisms-of-engram-consolidation-and-memory-refinement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Unveiling-the-cellular-mechanisms-of-engram-consolidation-and-memory-refinement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28d46e3f-6161-4aae-b8a1-8551716a447c Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:09:34 -0500 Unveiling the cellular mechanisms of engram consolidation and memory refinement
突破性研究确定 FAM3C 是乳腺癌进展的关键调节因子UNIST 生物科学系 Jiyoung Park 教授及其研究团队进行的一项开创性研究发现，FAM3C（一种由癌症相关脂肪细胞 (CAA) 产生的代谢调节信号分子）是乳腺癌进展的关键调节因子。肿瘤微环境（TME）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Groundwriting-study-identizes-FAM3C-as-a-key-regulator-of-breast-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Groundwriting-study-identizes-FAM3C-as-a-key-regulator-of-breast-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a503e91e-cd3f-4278-8425-2ea4082ccf14 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:58:52 -0500 Groundbreaking study identifies FAM3C as a key regulator of breast cancer progression
